versionNo.description: ICEGATE version being used: Default value 1.0

sequenceOrControlNumber.description: unique value that can be used to uniquely identify the document at User End

date.description: Date of transmission of message: YYYYMMDD Format

msgTyp.description: The Flag specifying the  action requested on this transmission

jobNo.description: The Unique ID provided by User for this transmission

jobDt.description: The Date of generation of of Unique ID provided by User for this transmission

rptngEvent.description: The Code specifying the Reporting Event pertaining to this transmission,list of values, which will be accepted SAM,SDM,SAA,SEI,SDN

mnfstNoRotnNo.description: The Unique ID generated by Customs for this Complaince

mnfstDtRotnDt.description: The Date generation of Unique ID by Customs for  this Compliance

vesselTypMvmt.description: Indicator referring to Type of Vessel Movement as per SCMTR

authPrsn.description: The Details of Authorised person responsible as per Customs legislation

sbmtrTyp.description: The Type of Authorised Entity submitting this Manifest

sbmtrCd.description: The Code of Authorised Entity submitting this Manifest

authSeaCarrierCd.description: The Registered Code of Authorised Sea Carrier ( Entity responsible for operating the Conveyance)

trmnlOprtrCd.description: The Code of the Terminal Custodian at the Port of Call

modeOfTrnsprt.description: Mode of Transport used for crossing the Border/Movement,Coded

typOfTrnsprtMeans.description: The type of identifier of the means of transport used in crossing the border/Movement, coded,default Values â€“ 10,11

trnsprtMeansId.description: Identifier to identify the means of transport used for crossing the Border/Movement,Coded

shipTyp.description: The type of the ship shown on its IMO ship's certificate.

nmbrOfPsngrs.description: The count of persons on board the ship who are passengers as defined by SOLAS

nmbrOfCrew.description: The count of persons actually employed for duties on board during a voyage in the working or service of a ship and included in the crew list

totalNoOfCntrsLanded.description: The Total Count of Transport Equipments Landed

totalNoOfCntrsLoaded.description: The Total Count of Transport Equipments Loaded

totalNmbrOfPrsnsOnBoard.description: The total number of persons on board the ship including crew and passengers

totalNoOfTrnsprtEqmtRprtdOnArvlDptr.description: The Count of Transport Equipment reported on the arrival/Departure

totalNmbrOfTrnsprtContractsRprtdOnArvlDp.description: The Count of Transport Contracts Manifested on the arrival/Departure

tmSuprtDocs.description: The Details of Supporting Documents provided in reference to the cargo in Transport Document

tagRef.description: The Flag indicating the part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

refSerialNo.description: The Serial number in that part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

subSerialNoRef.description: The Sub Serial Number in that part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

icegateUserid.description: The ICEGATE ID of the User who uploaded this document

irnNmbr.description: The Unique Reference Number given by eSanchit on uploading of this document

docRefNmbr.description: The Unique Reference Number given by the Issuer to this document

docTypCd.description: The Identifier assigned by Customs to identify the type of the document

bnefcryCd.description: The Idenfier of the Beneficiary of this Document

tmAdtnlDec.description: The Details of Additional Declaration provided in reference to this Voyage

tagRef.description: The Flag indicating the part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

refSerialNo.description: The Serial number in that part of the declaration to which this document is referenced

infoTyp.description: The code indicating the type of Additional Declaration being made

infoQualifier.description: The Code indicating the additional declaration being made

infoCd.description: The Response to the additional declaration as a Code

infoText.description: The Response to the additional declaration as a Text

infoMsr.description: The Response to Additional Declaration as a measure

infoDt.description: The Response to Additional Declaration as a date
